title: FYI - selling some collectible RELATED books
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: FYI - selling some collectible RELATED books
posts.post_content:
including some showing early baseball cigar labels, guides and bibles, baseball memorabilia like balls and gloves, other sports, and cards. Many signed, a few personalized, but information is always king. Mostly trying to get these to the next interested collector. I WILL be listing some daily as I'm home with Covid. I feel just fine.

eBay: floridamoment
